evidence_example.title: Uart isr (isr, blocking mode) test demo
evidence_example.small_descr: This is the demo to test Uart isr (isr, blocking mode) on FPG-EYE Board devices.
evidence_example.long_descr:
Uart isr test(isr, blocking mode).

This demo shows how to use UART driver for Lattice Mico32 device to send and receive characters.

The UART controller is configured in ISR mode and in blocking mode for tx and rx.

The demo is as shown in test1 but the led is turned on/off in the ISR callbacks.

The demo requires a RS232 serial connection with a 115200 bps, 8N1 configuration.
